Atheism.summary: Belief in the absence of any deities, focusing on reason, science, and human ethics.

Agnosticism.summary: Position of uncertainty toward the existence of God or the divine.

Humanism.summary: Ethical philosophy placing human welfare, reason, and dignity at the center of moral reflection.

New_Age.summary: Eclectic modern movement blending spirituality, mysticism, and self-realization.

Scientology.summary: Modern spiritual system emphasizing personal enlightenment and freedom through auditing practices.
